instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up or tap All apps. Tap Calendar. Tap Menu and select from the following: Schedule Day 3 Day Week Month
From the Home screen, swipe up or tap All apps. Tap Calendar. Tap Menu. Tap each individual email account you are logged in through to change calendars.
From the Home screen, swipe up or tap All apps. Tap Calendar. Tap the plus sign . Enter the Title, date, time and details. When finished, tap Save.
